snippet: This all-male troupe, founded in 2011, debuted two works at Jacob’s Pillow last week in Becket, Mass.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance performance by Madboots Dance company at Jacob's Pillow Dance Festival, Becket, Massachusetts.
lead_paragraph: This all-male troupe, founded in 2011, debuted two works at Jacob’s Pillow last week in Becket, Mass.

headline.main: Review: Madboots Dance Ignores Gender Boundaries
headline.print_headline: An All-Male Troupe That Ignores Supposed Gender Boundaries
